languages.text: "Паскаль, объясни простолюдину, что мне не интересно, из какого он племени, и что он забыл опуститься на колени".
"Pasqal, explain to the commoner that I do not care what tribe he is from, and that he should kneel in the presence of the Rogue Trader."
languages.original_text: "Паскаль, объясни простолюдину, что мне не интересно, из какого он племени, и что он забыл опуститься на колени".

traits.locale_text: "Pasqal, explain the commoner that I don't care what tribe he is from and that he forgot to kneel."
"Pasqal, explain the commoner that I don't care what tribe he is from and that he forgot to kneel."
"Pasqal, explain to the commoner that I don't care what tribe he is from and that he forgot to kneel."
"Pasqal, explain to the commoner that I don't care what tribe he is from and that he forgot to kneel."
"Pasqal, explain to the commoner that I do not care what tribe he is from, and that he should kneel in the presence of the Rogue Trader."
"Pasqal, explain to the commoner that I do not care what tribe he is from, and that he should kneel in the presence of the Rogue Trader."

languages.text: 「パスカル、この平民に説明してやってくれ。{mf|俺|私}はお前が何の部族でも気にしない。それに、自由開拓者の前にひざまずくのを忘れてやしないか、と」
languages.original_text: "Pasqal, explain to the commoner that I do not care what tribe he is from, and that he should kneel in the presence of the Rogue Trader."

traits.locale_text: 「パスカル、この平民に説明してやってくれ。{mf|俺|私}はお前が何の部族でも気にしない。それに、自由開拓者の前にひざまずくのを忘れてやしないか、と」

languages.text: “帕斯卡，告诉这个贱民，我不在乎他来自哪个部落。无论是谁。见到行商浪人都得跪下。”
languages.original_text: "Pasqal, explain to the commoner that I do not care what tribe he is from, and that he should kneel in the presence of the Rogue Trader."

traits.locale_text: “帕斯卡，告诉这个贱民，我不在乎他来自哪个部落，我只在乎他忘了在我面前下跪。”

languages.text: « Pasqal, expliquez donc à ce roturier que je me fiche de sa tribu et qu'il a oublié de s'agenouiller devant {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande}. »
languages.original_text: "Pasqal, explain to the commoner that I do not care what tribe he is from, and that he should kneel in the presence of the Rogue Trader."

traits.locale_text: « Pasqal, expliquez donc à ce roturier que je me fiche de sa tribu et qu'il a oublié de s'agenouiller. »

languages.text: «Pasqal, explíquele al plebeyo que me da igual de qué tribu viene y que debería arrodillarse en presencia de {mf|un|una} Comerciante Independiente».
languages.original_text: "Pasqal, explain to the commoner that I do not care what tribe he is from, and that he should kneel in the presence of the Rogue Trader."

traits.locale_text: «Pasqal, explícale a este plebeyo que no me importa de la tribu que sea y que se ha olvidado de arrodillarse».

languages.text: "Pasqal, bitte erklärt dem Wurm, dass es mich nicht schert, welchem Stamm er angehört, und dass er in Anwesenheit {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} niederzuknien hat."
languages.original_text: "Pasqal, explain to the commoner that I do not care what tribe he is from, and that he should kneel in the presence of the Rogue Trader."

traits.locale_text: "Pasqal, bitte erklärt dem Wurm, dass es mich nicht schwert, welchem Stamm er angehört, und dass er vergessen hat, niederzuknien."

languages.text: "Pasqal, bu avama hangi kabileden geldiğini umursamadığımı ve Hür Tacir'in huzurunda diz çökmesi gerektiğini açıkla."
languages.original_text: "Pasqal, explain to the commoner that I do not care what tribe he is from, and that he should kneel in the presence of the Rogue Trader."

traits.locale_text: "Pasqal, bu avama hangi kabileden geldiğini umursamadığımı ve Hür Tacir'in huzurunda diz çökmesi gerektiğini açıkla."
